2. Next, we will examine each row of the table one by one, checking if any team scored below 10 points.

3. In each row, we will compare the score of the home team with the score of the away team. If a team scores below 10 points and its opponent scores above or equal to 10 points, then that claim can be considered FALSE for that match.
